backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 379 Adelaide Street West

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 78-2020 to designate 379 Adelaide Street West (Spadina-Fort York, Ward 10) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
